title: No chidren node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab.
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node listing is not displayed. After creating a new data set without an SQL statement, when attempting to change the data source that has no database/table/column information, the children node listing is not shown. This issue persists even after closing and reopening the data set editor.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a new data set without providing an SQL statement.
2. Choose a data source that has no database/table/column information.
3. Observe that the children node listing is not displayed when attempting to change the data source in the data set editor page of the query tab.
